meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7710.

td.p: Suzie Newman, an early childhood educator from New York, New York
Matt Lisiecki, an international development researcher from Brooklyn, New York
Laura McLean, a data analyst from Nashville, Tennessee (whose 2-day cash winnings total $19,598)

tr.td: THAT BOOK TITLE MAKES ME HUNGRY
CHARITABLE FOLKS
MILITARY MOVIE MATTERS
MYANMAR
"SHADOW"
STROLLING DOWN THE AVENUE
